metadata.job_location: Las Condes, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile

seniority_level.evidence: Title 'Data Engineer' combined with 5+ years experience requirement aligns with senior level in data engineering hierarchy

job_family.evidence: Job title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on building data pipelines, data modeling, and data quality

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on building data pipelines to collect, integrate, consolidate, clean and structure data for analytical use suggests batch ETL work rather than real-time streaming

leadership_expectation.evidence: Explicitly mentions providing mentorship and reviewing implementations of junior data engineers, indicating technical leadership without direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly mentions Google Cloud Platform (GCP) as the primary cloud platform to stay current with and implement solutions on

secondary_clouds.evidence: Mentions 'basic knowledge of other cloud environments' suggesting AWS and Azure as secondary clouds, though not explicitly named

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on building data pipelines for analytical use, data consolidation, and transformation suggests batch processing rather than real-time streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools like Airflow, Dagster, or cloud-native orchestrators are mentioned in the job description

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions preparing data for analytical use and building pipelines without specifying whether data is stored in warehouse, lake, or lakehouse, suggesting a mixed environment

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Santiago, Chile with 'geo_restriction_type: specific_countries' and 'allowed_countries: [CL]' indicating work must be based in Chile

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to Chile with no mention of global or multi-timezone teams, indicating focus on Chilean time zone

relocation_required.evidence: Location specified as Santiago, Chile with no mention of relocation package or requirement to move, suggesting candidate must already be in Chile

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship and location restricted to Chile suggests no H1B sponsorship available

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location in Chile and no mention of student visa support suggests not OPT/CPT friendly

citizenship_required.evidence: No explicit citizenship requirement mentioned, but location in Chile implies authorization to work in Chile is required

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No mention of contract types, but typical for full-time roles in Chile to be W2 equivalent employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in the job description or pass1 extraction

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions mentoring junior engineers and being part of regional team, implying growth opportunities but no explicit career tracks

mentorship_signals.evidence: Explicitly states 'Proporcionar orientación y mentoría a ingenieros de datos junior' and 'Revisar las implementaciones... realizadas por ingenieros de datos junior'

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: Mentoring junior engineers suggests IC track progression, but no explicit mention of management or other tracks

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have skills (Python, SQL, GCP, Git, CI/CD) and nice-to-have skills (scripting, cloud concepts) with 5+ years experience required

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on data engineering responsibilities including pipeline building, data modeling, and data quality with clear expectations

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (Python, SQL, GCP, Git, CI/CD) are reasonable for a senior data engineer with 5+ years experience
